help-file.title: "FAERIE FOG"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Temporary or Permanent at random Type of spell: Divination
"Faerie Fog" is an area-effect "Dispel Invisible", you do not have to see the target in order for it to take effect. The fog can also bring victims out of hiding or perhaps even reveal their true identity.
